lines.text: Ashes to ashes, dust to dust. When there is a mystery, in Snoopy we trust.

[to "Detective" Snoopy, thinking he's playacting]
Your money or your life, you dirty rat!

[seeing Snoopy and Woodstock run away to get Woodstock's nest]
Hey, kid! Come back! We didn't finish the game! Come back, Snoooooop!
Ashes to ashes, and dust to dust. Snoopy will find it, and find it he must.
That's a broom straw. So what?
Ashes to ashes and dust to dust. The proof of the pudding is under the crust.
